channel.title: A bug when speaking to npc's
channel.description:
if i try to do something that involves speaking to an npc, it works fine however
if you speak to the npc and he is to say for example
"hi do you want to go to the training grounds"
and then i click to continue to go onto the next screen, it just says please wait and does nothing.
does anybody know how to fix this? please :)

item.title: A bug when speaking to npc's
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:

if i try to do something that involves speaking to an npc, it works fine however

if you speak to the npc and he is to say for example

“hi
do you want to go to the training grounds”

and then i click to continue to go onto the next screen, it just says please wait and does nothing.

does anybody know how to fix this? please
